word.item: I, tomorrow, next week, salim i kam, salim tok i go

interlinear-text.item: 141104_02_T3 A day working on the airstrip (correction dans 2015.III.S18)

word.item: we, today, young men, men, went to work. The work done, at two o'clock, we go to the garden cleaning ground(?), then the night we come back to the house.

interlinear-text.item: 141104_03_T4 How Martin Sipamo killed a crocodile (correction dans 2015.III.S18)

word.item: I went downstream with a dog.
Downstream, on Tepeso, I saw a crocodile, sleeping deep inside the water.
Tamblau, lo Tepeso, mi lukluk na lukim pukpuk i slip insaid lo wara.
I shoot the crocodile with a spear on the top of the neck and I get him.
We went upstream to the houses of Sumwari with a motor canoe
After going, we pull the canoe, we cook marita with mumu, and we are happy when the mumu is finished and we eat the marita [...].
I went visiting Samuel on the other bank, at the time the night was coming.
"hariap, hariap", shout Samuel, "hariap", then I hurry up.

interlinear-text.item: 141105_06_T9 ? voir liste des activit√©s quotidiennes par sana

word.item: I went to the garden on the other bank, after having uprooting some sticks of banana and having gone to the garden planting it will come back to the house.
